mapper.select: select groups_members.id ,groups.group_name as groups_group_name ,accounts.user as accounts_user from groups_members left join `groups` on groups_members.group_id = groups.id and (groups_members.account_id != groups.account_id or groups_members.account_id is null) left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where groups.id = #{groupId}
select count(accounts.user) from groups_members left join `groups` on groups_members.group_id = groups.id left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where groups.id = #{groupId}
select groups_members.id ,accounts.user as accounts_user from groups_members left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where groups_members.id = #{memberId}

select groups_members.id from groups_members left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where accounts.email_address = #{email} and (groups_members.group_id = #{group.id} or groups_members.account_id = #{group.accountId})
select groups.account_id from groups_members left join `groups` on group_id = groups.id where groups_members.id = #{memberId}
